text: @GvanOnselen @BDliveSA You lost the plot in trying to politicize such a deadly matter. I think the EFF & all opposition parties are putting SA first. We must unite in de fight against this invisible enemy...#nopolitics on COVID-19 @Julius_S_Malema, @jsteenhuisen, @CyrilRamaphosa
